name: Total War in Europe: First Blitzkrieg
name_original: Total War in Europe: First Blitzkrieg
description:
Total War in Europe: First Blitzkrieg is a strategy game developed by John Tiller. It was originally released in 2005. HPS Simulations published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Total War in Europe: First Blitzkrieg on PC.
